nodes.text: Star Wars: Return of the Jedi: Activity Book

Star Wars: Return of the Jedi: Activity Book is a fully illustrated activity book based on the original trilogy film Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. It was published by Egmont UK Ltd on July 2, 2015.
It was one of three activity books released, along with Star Wars: A New Hope: Activity Book and Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back: Activity Book.
